name: dynamic-image-slides
description: simple image slide show that updates using socket.io

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=8090 TIMER_SEC=30 PASS=guilty_spark node server/index.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=8090 TIMER_SEC=30 PASS=guilty_spark nodemon server/index.js --watch server
